title: Are the NCERT and Peter Stykes theory enough for the JEE Advanced? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: No, it is not enough. Its a good book for understanding the reaction mechanism. But you have many other aspects of Organic Chemistry to cover for JEE Advanced. Look at LG Wade or Morrison Boyd. These are renowned text books. Have a good DLP for practicing problems. Happy learning.
